events.title: Candlelight Vigil for Logan
events.address: 1 Lincoln Financial Field Way, Philadelphia, PA 19148
events.description: Join us for a candlelight vigil honoring Logan's memory and standing together for justice. Bring candles, flowers, and photos to share. All are welcome.

events.title: Preliminary Hearing - Case #2025-CR-001234
events.description: Preliminary hearing for the criminal case. Public attendance is encouraged to show support. Please arrive 30 minutes early for security screening.

events.title: Criminal Justice Reform Town Hall
events.description: Community town hall discussing criminal justice reform and victim's rights. Featuring local legislators, advocates, and community leaders. Open Q&A session included.

events.title: Legislative Hearing - Senate Bill 789
events.description: Public hearing on Senate Bill 789: Enhanced Penalties for Reckless Endangerment. This bill directly relates to Logan's case. Public testimony slots available - register to speak.

events.title: Community Fundraiser for Legal Defense Fund
events.location: Citizens Bank Park - Parking Lot K
events.description: Family-friendly fundraiser featuring food trucks, live music, and kids activities. All proceeds support the Justice for Logan Legal Defense Fund and victim advocacy programs.

events.title: Memorial Walk & 5K Run
events.address: Martin Luther King Jr. Dr & Falls Bridge, Philadelphia, PA 19130
events.description: Annual memorial walk and 5K run honoring Logan and raising awareness for criminal justice reform. Registration includes t-shirt and refreshments. All fitness levels welcome.

events.title: Victim's Rights Workshop
events.description: Educational workshop for crime victims and their families. Learn about your rights in the criminal justice system, available resources, and how to navigate the legal process.

events.title: Arraignment Hearing - Case #2025-CR-001234
events.description: Arraignment hearing where formal charges will be read and plea will be entered. Public attendance welcome.

events.title: Legislative Advocacy Day
events.description: Join advocates from across Pennsylvania for Legislative Advocacy Day. Meet with your representatives, share Logan's story, and push for meaningful criminal justice reform. Transportation from Philadelphia available.
events.organizer: Pennsylvania Coalition for Criminal Justice Reform

events.title: Art & Healing Workshop
events.description: Therapeutic art workshop for those grieving Logan and anyone affected by violence. Create memorial art pieces, share stories, and heal together. All art supplies provided. No experience necessary.
